sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin berlari cepat untuk mencapai garis finish.
english translation: I want to run fast to reach the finish line.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak saya kehilangan ceretnya di sekolah.
english translation: My child lost their pencil box at school.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu saya sangat cerewet dan selalu ingin tahu semua yang terjadi di sekitarnya.
english translation: My mother is very talkative and always wants to know everything happening around her.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Adik perempuan saya adalah seorang cewek yang cantik.
english translation: My younger sister is a beautiful girl.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jika Anda ragu-ragu, cobalah tanya kepada seseorang yang lebih berpengalaman.
english translation: If you are unsure, try asking someone more experienced.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka makan coklat setiap hari.
english translation: I like to eat chocolate every day.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong ambil cucian dari mesin cuci dan jemur di luar.
english translation: Please take the laundry from the washing machine and hang it outside.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kakek dan nenek saya sangat bahagia memiliki banyak cucu.
english translation: My grandparents are very happy to have many grandchildren.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia selalu cuek dan tidak pernah peduli dengan perasaan orang lain.
english translation: He is always indifferent and never cares about other people's feelings.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anda perlu tidur cukup agar tetap sehat.
english translation: You need to get enough sleep to stay healthy.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya punya waktu cuma 5 menit untuk makan siang.
english translation: I only have 5 minutes for lunch.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Diskon ini memberikan kesempatan bagi anda mendapatkan produk kami cuma-cuma.
english translation: This discount gives you the opportunity to get our product free of charge.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya merasa curiga dengan perilaku anehnya.
english translation: I feel suspicious about his strange behavior.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pedagang ini memiliki berbagai macam dagangan yang menarik.
english translation: This merchant has various interesting merchandise.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan pergi ke toko makanan dan toko buku.
english translation: I will go to the grocery store and the bookstore.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sangat suka mendansa dan sering mengikuti kelas tari.
english translation: She loves to dance and often takes dance classes.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya yakin Anda dapat melakukan apapun yang Anda impikan.
english translation: I believe you can achieve anything you dream of.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buku ini saya beli dari toko buku terdekat.
english translation: I bought this book from the nearest bookstore.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anda tahu dari mana dia berasal?
english translation: Do you know where he is from?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya lebih suka minum teh daripada kopi.
english translation: I prefer drinking tea rather than coffee.
